programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas Gets it Right/What’s the Matter with Henry/As Good as Gordon
programme.desc: Thomas transports eggs, Henry doesn’t feel well and Emily pulls Gordon’s express.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Thomas has to move stinky fish, Skarloey is given a fright and Emily has an urgent job.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Halloween/Trusty Rusty/You Can Do It, Toby!
programme.desc: Thomas and Emily are spooked on Halloween, Duncan doesn’t listen and Toby saves Gordon.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: James Goes Too Far/Three Cheers for Thomas/Chickens to School
programme.desc: James gets an important job, Thomas wants a medal and Thomas takes three specials.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Too Hot for Thomas/Salty’s Stormy Tale/Percy and the Magic Carpet
programme.desc: Thomas misses out on a trip, Salty gets teased and Percy’s carpet starts to fly.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: Thomas has two jobs, Arthur is put to work and an unusual new engine arrives on Sodor.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Molly’s Special Special/Edward the Really Useful Engine/Respect for Gordo
programme.desc: Molly arrives, the big engines think Edward is old and Gordon’s firebox develops a rattle.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Birthday Picnic/Harold and the Flying Horse/Tuneful Toots
programme.desc: Thomas helps with a picnic, Harold feels left out and Rusty’s two-tone horn is tuneful.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Toy Shop/Something Fishy/Rheneas and the Dinosaur
programme.desc: A new toy shop opens, Arthur wants a new route and Mr. Percival needs two careful engines.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the New Engine/Bulgy Rides Again/Toby Feels Left Out
programme.desc: Neville arrives in Sodor, Bulgy the Bus carries passengers and the Sodor Museum opens.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas Tries His Best/No Sleep for Cranky/The Magic Lamp
programme.desc: The carnival comes to Sodor, Cranky is in no mood for a story and Rusty tells a story.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas and the Statue/Toby’s Windmill/Henry and the Flagpole
programme.desc: A special statue is delivered, Toby’s windmill is damaged and Henry collects a flagpole.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Emily Knows Best/Gordon Takes a Tumble/Thomas’ Day Off
programme.desc: Emily decides to be queen for a day, Gordon is proud and Dennis delivers roof tiles.

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.sub-title: Thomas’s New Trucks/Toby Had a Little Lamb/Duncan and the Old Mine
programme.desc: Thomas wants new trucks, lambs get stuck and The Narrow Guage engines carry coal.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers shows a photo album of sweaters his mother made for him to show her love.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Chef Brockett shows how to make different things with bananas.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers shows different kinds of fans and explains wind's effects.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Renowned artist, Red Grooms, gives Mister Rogers a tour of his studio and a bus sculpture.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.sub-title: Mad: Healthy Ways to Express Anger
programme.desc: Mister Rogers explains that there are different ways to deal with mad feelings.

programme.sub-title: Mad: Things to Do with Our Hands
programme.desc: There are lots of things people do with their hands.

programme.desc: Mister Rogers visits people who make and play steel pans.

programme.title: Mister Rogers' Neighborhood
programme.desc: Mister Rogers uses paper and a special pen to demonstrate calligraphy and shares a film.

programme.desc: Mister Rogers shares a poem he transcribed in italic script.

programme.desc: Mister Rogers arrives with a few small padlocks and their keys.

programme.sub-title: Jealousy: Wishes Don't Make Things Come True

programme.sub-title: Jealousy: Everyone Has a Special Place Here
